title: Champion Popularity.
body:
>Champion Popularity = # of unique players who played a champion x avg # games players play on a champion

So in other words, the amount of games played on a champion is equal to the amount of games played on a champion

http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/10/tim-and-eric-mind-blown.gif
